author: scottbw
msg: Initial commit of Flatpack feature (see WOOKIE-182) with some tests to show how the code works. This is early days - still to do are persisting links between Widget objects and their original .wgt archives, handling flattened Features, and the API & UI for exposing the capability to clients

author: rajith
msg: As the first step added system properties for host, port and address and got rid of the jndi lookup.
There is also a system property for URL which allows a user to specify a fully fledged URL with various connection options like SSL etc..
If the host & port is specified the URL property is ignored.
I also added some documentation in the perf_report.sh suggesting recommended settings for performance testing.
These are guidelines only and a prospective user needs to experiment with their environment to fine tune the settings.

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-401: httpHedaer renamed to ResponseHeaders and an instance of javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders available as requestHeaders

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2038 Modified stop to always call listener destroy() method

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2038 Modified destroy() to always call listener.shutdown() method. Removed code that explicitly waited for all threads to finish. This is no longed needed as all threads are daemon threads.
